A term that best describes the content of the resource. Please select the authority that applies to the term entered in genre.
Use form to describe the resource (not the content).

properties.description:
Select a three letter iso639-2b language code from the select menu. This list comes from
http://apps.ncsc.org/wayfarer/showtype.asp?id=325
No Linguistic Content at bottom of the select list.

options.chu: Church Slavic; Church Slavonic; Old Bulgarian; Old Church Slavonic, Old Slavonic
options.nds: German, Low; Low German; Low Saxon; Saxon, Low

properties.description:
A term that best describes the resource. Please select the authority that applies to the term entered in form.
Use genre to describe the content of the resource (not the resource itself).
properties.title: Form

properties.default_value: mods:note authority attribute is fixed now
properties.title: Note

properties.description: Name of a country, i.e. a political entity considered a country.
properties.title: Country

properties.description: Includes first order political divisions called provinces within a country, e.g. in Canada.
properties.title: Province (State)

properties.description: Includes regions that have status as a jurisdiction, usually incorporating more than one first level jurisdiction.
properties.title: Region

properties.description: Name of the largest local administrative unit in various countries, e.g. England.
properties.title: County

properties.description: Name of an inhabited place incorporated as a city, town, etc.
properties.title: City

properties.description: Name of a smaller unit within a populated place, e.g., neighborhoods, parks, or streets.
properties.title: City Section

properties.description:
Contains a statement of coordinates covered by the resource.
Latitude: 35.964668 N
Longitude: -83.926453 W
properties.title: Coordinates
